General.Description: SALT is a member-based lending and borrowing network allowing users to take advantage of their assets to secure their loans in cash. SALT Secured Automated Lending Technology is a heterogeneous architecture of protocols and assets designed to accommodate the continuous rise of blockchain assets. The SALT platform is automatic and secure on encryption. SALT is a lending platform designed specifically to block assets; Operates as a second layer protocol, located at the top of any public or allowed blockchain, allowing basic assets to be used as collateral to access credit.
General.Features: SALT allows you to leverage blockchain assets to secure your cash loans. We make easy money without having to sell your preferred investment. It includes some powerful features like easy application, fast approval, and no credit check; Take deposits directly into your bank account; Competitive interest rates with no prepayment fees; Maintain your position and avoid tax inconsistencies; Freely take back your property whenever you want; Get your money for anything you want.
General.Technology: SALT is a protocol and agnostic property architecture designed to accommodate the continuous increase of the blockchain property class. It is based on the powerful blockchain technology.
